name: Incredible Paint People
description:
Sandbox demo for a player controller developed in Unity.

Inspired by the player controller in the game Super Meat Boy but in no way affiliated with it.

Some of the additional features include "Coyote Time" and jump input caching.

Incredibly tight and responsive 2D player controller with tile based painting system. Run, jump, sprint and bounce off the walls. Easy local multiplayer setup with different colors for characters.

Keyboard:

  • Press space bar to spawn
  • Left & Right arrow keys to move left and right
  • Space bar to jump
  • Shift to sprint

Gamepad:

  • Press south button (i.e. A on xbox controller) to spawn
  • Left joystick to move left or right
  • South button (i.e. A on xbox controller) to jump
  • West button (i.e. X on xbox controller) to sprint
